summary: The implementation successfully addresses all five requirements. The pricing section was removed from the landing page, a new Subscriptions page was created with proper routing and sidebar navigation, two pricing tiers (Basic ₹300/month and Premium ₹500/month) were implemented with glassmorphism styling and BorderBeam animations, features were differentiated between tiers with the requested specifics, and Subscribe CTA buttons trigger toast notifications as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a 'Most Popular' badge to the Premium tier card
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention adding a 'Most Popular' badge or any visual badge distinguishing the Premium tier beyond the requested glassmorphism styling and hover effects
